article.body: Amazon Prime Video has a decent selection of movies coming in August 2020, along with a handful of original series. Among the originals, the most prominent are âWorldâs Toughest Race: Eco-Challenge Fijiâ (Aug. 14), a 10-episode docuseries hosted by Bear Grylls in which 66 teams from around the world race for 11 days across the jungles, mountains and waters of Fiji; âChemical Heartsâ (Aug. 21), a teen romance based on the novel âOur Chemical Heartsâ and starring Lili Reinhart and Austin Abrams; and new episodes of kids shows âClifford the Big Red Dogâ (Aug. 21) and âJessy and Nessyâ (Aug. 7). div.youtube { height:0; position:relative; padding-bottom:56.25%; } div.youtube > iframe { position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } div.youtube { height:0; position:relative; padding-bottom:56.25%; } div.youtube > iframe { position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; } Amazon.com Inc,âs AMZN, +3.01% Â streaming service is also adding movies such as Tom Hardyâs biopic âCaponeâ (Aug. 10); âArkansasâ (Aug. 5), a crime thriller starring Liam Hemsworth; âPeanut Butter Falconâ (Aug. 6), the 2019 drama starring Shia LaBeouf and Dakota Johnson; as well as â80s classic such as âTop Gun,â âRain Manâ and âSteel Magnoliasâ (all Aug. 1). Also: Whatâs coming in August to Netflix | Hulu | HBO Max And more:Hereâs whatâs worth streaming in August 2020: âLovecraft Country,â âImmigration Nationâ and more Hereâs the full lineup of whatâs on tap for Amazon Prime Video, as of July 24 (release dates are subject to change):Whatâs coming in August Aug. 1 3:10 To Yuma (2007) Four Weddings And A Funeral (1994) Inception (2010) Margin Call (2011) My Bloody Valentine (1981) Rain Man (1988) Rustlersâ Rhapsody (1985) Safe (2012) Somethingâs Gotta Give (2003) Spare Parts (2015) Spider-Man 3 (2007) Steel Magnolias (1989) The Holiday (2006) Top Gun (1986) Beverly Hillbillies: Season 1 (Best TV Ever) Beyond Scared Straight: Season 1 (A&E Crime Central) Bitchinâ Rides: Season 1 (Motortrend) Blood: Season 1 (Acorn TV) Californication: Season 1 (Showtime) Chesapeake Shores: Season 1 (Hallmark Movies Now) Dustyâs Trail: Season 1 (Best Westerns Ever) Fifth Ward: Season 1 (Urban Movie Channel) Ice Road Truckers: Season 1 (History Vault) Lego Jurassic World: Legend Of Isla Nublar: Season 1 Les Miserables: Season 1 (PBS Masterpiece) Moveable Feast: Season 1 (PBS Living) Riviera: Season 1 (Sundance Now) The Berenstein Bears: Season 1 (PBS Kids) The Teacher: Season 1 (PBS Masterpiece) Aug. 3 Dora and the Last City of Gold (2019) div.youtube { height:0;
